Uses of Interface
org.kocakosm.pitaya.security.KDF

  • Packages that use KDF 
    Package Description
    org.kocakosm.pitaya.security  

    • Uses of KDF in org.kocakosm.pitaya.security

      Methods in org.kocakosm.pitaya.security that return KDF 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static KDF KDFs.hkdf(Algorithm<MAC> mac, byte[] info, int dkLen)
      Creates and returns a new immutable KDF instance implementing the HKDF algorithm (RFC 5869).
      static KDF KDFs.pbkdf1(Algorithm<Digest> digest, int iterationCount, int dkLen)
      Creates and returns a new immutable KDF instance implementing the PBKDF1 algorithm (RFC 2898).
      static KDF KDFs.pbkdf2(Algorithm<MAC> mac, int iterationCount, int dkLen)
      Creates and returns a new immutable KDF instance implementing the PBKDF2 algorithm (RFC 2898).
      static KDF KDFs.scrypt(int r, int n, int p, int dkLen)
      Creates and returns a new immutable KDF instance implementing the SCrypt algorithm as specified by the Internet Engineering Task Force.
